title: i dont even know how to take this
body:
so i was going into my first promotional of the season log in everything is fine pick champs all that goes through and boom as soon as game starts loading i get league crashes and is replaced with this box reading  
League of Legends- Bad image
C:\Riot Games\RADS\solutions\lol-game-client-sln\releases\0.0.1.155\deploy
\Riotlauncher.dll is either not designed to ruun on Windows or it
contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original
installation media or contact your system administrator or the software
vendor for support. Error status )xc000012f

im going to uninstall and reinstall now but why did this happen? also is there anyway to get this loss forgiven that it seemed to give me dont excatly wanna start the season with a loss cause whatever bullcrap happend

replies.body: This certainly isn't a desirable beginning to placements, but there's still more to play!  It sounds like some driver or even hardware problem is failing to load the game and crashing out.  Go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this up, going over each step to cover everything.  Test it in custom games to prevent any penalties as well.  Let me know what you find!
